definition: to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
It's a long and intricate story, I hardly know where to start.
pinyin: yi1 bu4 er4 shi2 si4 shi3 , bu4 zhi1 cong2 he2 shuo1 qi3
containing_words.word: 一部二十四史，不知從何說起

sentences.chinese: 我可以從自己的經歷說起。

sentences.english: Speaking of Fortune kiln, not only hemp cities, mountains are famous throughout the eastern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 說起富鑫窯，不單麻城市，整個鄂東山區都赫赫有名。

sentences.english: Such was the coarse language of this bad, neglected boy.
sentences.chinese: 那個沒教養的壞孩子吉姆說起話來就是這麼粗俗。

sentences.english: It is because you know nothing about it that I'll tell you from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你對此事一無所知，所以我將對你從頭說起。

sentences.english: I have a lot to say, but don't know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 我有許多話要說，卻不知從何說起。

sentences.english: Suddenly I do not know how to say.
sentences.chinese: 一下子不知道從何說起。

sentences.english: When we talked about him, it was as clear as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們說起他的時候，那是再清楚不過了。

sentences.english: Li said that when he spoke he could "raise the dead to fight."
sentences.chinese: 李說他說起話來能“叫死人活過來打仗。”

sentences.english: The speeches were described by people who have consulted with her about the policy shift.
sentences.chinese: 一些向她諮詢過這個政策轉變的人說起了這個演講。

sentences.english: This friend talked about the unforgiven attitude of other relatives.
sentences.chinese: 這位朋友說起孩子出生後長輩的不諒解。

sentences.english: Speaking of the roads to Tibet, the most frequently taken is still the Qinghai-Tibet route.
sentences.chinese: 說起進藏的路，走的最多的還是青藏線。

sentences.english: Speaking of Chen Juan, in your mind what kind of response is singing?
sentences.chinese: 說起陳涓，在你的腦海中迴響的是怎樣的歌聲？

sentences.english: We often speak of tramps with contempt and put them in the same class as beggars
sentences.chinese: 說起流浪漢，我們常常帶着輕蔑。

definition: without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
